<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Earthen Destrier](/Monsters.aspx?ID=651)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

This wave of dirt takes the crude likeness of the melded forequarters of a charging warhorse and a rocky knight wielding a rudimentary lance of gray stone.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Elemental](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 19

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/ElementalEarth_EarthernDestrier.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 4">[Earthen Destrier](/Monsters.aspx?ID=651)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Earth" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=55" />
<trait label="Elemental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=57" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 108 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Perception** +10; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [tremorsense (imprecise) 60 feet](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=40)

**Languages**
[Terran](/Languages.aspx?ID=22)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +12

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +1

**Con** +4

**Int** -1

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 20 

**Fort** +14 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +10 

</row>

**HP** 72

**Immunities**
bleed, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=145)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 50 feet, burrow 30 feet; earth glide

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
lance arm +14 ([deadly d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d8+6 piercing and lancing charge

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
hoof +14,
**Damage** 2d6+6 bludgeoning

**Earth Glide**   An earthen destrier can [Burrow](/Actions.aspx?ID=93) through earthen matter, including rock. When it does so, it moves at its full burrow Speed, leaving no tunnels or signs of its passing.

**Lancing Charge**   If the destrier moved at least 10 feet directly before its lance arm Strike, it gains a +2 circumstance bonus to its damage roll.

**Tilting Strike** <actions string="Reaction" />  **Trigger** The earthen destrier tramples a creature; **Effect** The earthen destrier makes a lance arm Strike against the creature it's trampling at a –5 penalty.

**[Trample](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=39)** <actions string="Three Actions" />  Medium or smaller, hoof, DC 20

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-42" />
name: Earthen Destrier
